data: For practice guidelines, refer to Decision Support Tool (DTS): NIA EMLA (Eutectic mixture of local anaesthetics) Topical
Indication: For difficult intravenous (IV) needle insertion or implantable venous access device (IVAD)

Precautions / Special Considerations: 
- Do not apply to cuts, grazes, wounds or where there is a skin rash or eczema
- Do not rub the cream in
- Monitor the application site for degree of numbness
1 application, topical, once, drug form: cream
Notify treating provider if a sceond dose is required at the same time or subsequent visit
